content: Replace h1/text-3xl etc with proper Prism Headings in all views created in this branch
Ensure all guest paperwork events are separate guest events, not mixed with unified events
Remove default vs display_description duplication in AssignmentCardComponent
Check if member_mobile_autoclose_path pushes back into guest flow when not logged in
Verify if last_activity in check_session_timeout actually refreshes timeout
DRY up care_case queries in verify_guest_access and redirect_if_logged_in
Add care_case_id to token generation and validate against specific care_case
Add bare text in invalid.html.erb to translation file with proper messaging
Add bare text in verifications/new.html.erb to translation file
Properly rebase/merge paperwork access token and update to current requirements
Update and run all specs after completing all tasks
